channel.title: Comments on: Building an Open Science MOOC

item.title: By: Open Science MOOC: Spring Update - Green Tea and Velociraptors
item.dc:creator: Open Science MOOC: Spring Update - Green Tea and Velociraptors
item.description: […] this year, we announced that we were going to build an Open Science MOOC! So far, more than 30 people from around the world have contributed their time and expertise. […]
item.content:encoded: […] this year, we announced that we were going to build an Open Science MOOC! So far, more than 30 people from around the world have contributed their time and expertise. […]

item.title: By: Wojciech Francuzik
item.dc:creator: Wojciech Francuzik
item.description: Hi Jon! Count me in! If you need someone talking about reproducible reports using R and knitr I'd love to share what I have learned during last 4 years...
item.content:encoded: Hi Jon! Count me in! If you need someone talking about reproducible reports using R and knitr I’d love to share what I have learned during last 4 years…
